title: Jacob learning about gratitude - hindsight bias

content.description: During his Psychology of Well-Being course in college, Jacob learns about research that suggests regularly expressing gratitude toward others can increase subjective well-being. Based on this life experience, Jacob believes the outcome of this research is obvious, and everyone would intuitively recognize the value of gratitude.
